thread.title: Oscars 2017: All the Cutest Couples on the Red Carpet, Ranked (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: All the Cutest Couples on the Red Carpet, Ranked (PHOTOS)

author: Johnny Brayson
title: Oscars 2017: All the Cutest Couples on the Red Carpet, Ranked (PHOTOS)
text:
12. James Corden & Julia Carey Advertisement 
The show's host sacrificed his own fashion sense in order to match his wife's dress. That's love. 11. Nicole Kidman & Keith Urban 11. Nicole Kidman & Keith Urban Advertisement 
Everyone's favorite Aussie celebrity couple did not disappoint. 10. Scarlett Johansson & Joe Machota 10. Scarlett Johansson & Joe Machota Advertisement 
Scar-Jo brought her agent as her date, which isn't exactly conventional, but they sure did look great together! 9. Dwayne Johnson & Lauren Hashian 9. Dwayne Johnson & Lauren Hashian Advertisement 
People 's Sexiest Man Alive and his girlfriend were both glowing on the red carpet. 8. Busy Phillipps & Michelle Williams 8. Busy Phillipps & Michelle Williams Advertisement 
BFFs totally count as a couple when they're as close as these two. 7. Jackie Chan & These Pandas 7. Jackie Chan & These Pandas Advertisement 
We guess this is technically a threesome and not a couple, but look how cute! 6. Chris Evans & Jeremy Renner 6. Chris Evans & Jeremy Renner Advertisement 
Captain America and Hawkeye opted for an Avengers-style fight before the ceremony. 5. Denzel & Pauletta Washington
